title: Son of the Moon
description: Can you face the consequences of cheating the Fates? Alexander the Great journeys to India, where he and Ashley are welcomed with feasts and treachery. With their son, Paul, being worshiped as the Son of the Moon, and Alexanderâ€™s looming death, Ashley considers the unthinkable: how to save them and whether she dares to cheat Fate?
author: Jennifer Macaire
